display_html:
class (ShelleyBasedEra era, State (EraRule "PPUP" era) ~ PPUPState era, Default (State (EraRule "PPUP" era)), HasField "_maxBHSize" (PParams era) Natural, HasField "_maxTxSize" (PParams era) Natural, HasField "_a0" (PParams era) Rational, HasField "_nOpt" (PParams era) Natural, HasField "_rho" (PParams era) UnitInterval, HasField "_tau" (PParams era) UnitInterval, HasField "_protocolVersion" (PParamsDelta era) (StrictMaybe ProtVer), AdditionalGenesisConfig era ~ (), FromCBOR (PParams era), FromCBOR (PParamsDelta era), ToCBOR (PParams era)) ⇒ ShelleyBasedEra era where
  • shelleyBasedEraName ∷ proxy era → Text
name: ShelleyBasedEra shelleyBasedEraName

display_html:
data HardForkBlock (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern BlockShelley ∷ ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c) → ExampleBlock c
  • pattern BlockExample ∷ ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c) → ExampleBlock c
name: HardForkBlock BlockShelley BlockExample

display_html:
data HardForkApplyTxErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ApplyTxErrShelley ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → ExampleApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrExample ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ExampleApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → ExampleApplyTxErr c
name: HardForkApplyTxErr ApplyTxErrShelley ApplyTxErrExample ApplyTxErrWrongEra

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerError (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern LedgerErrorShelley ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → ExampleLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorExample ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ExampleLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → ExampleLedgerError c
name: HardForkLedgerError LedgerErrorShelley LedgerErrorExample LedgerErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data HardForkEnvelopeErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → ExampleOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorExample ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ExampleOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → ExampleOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
name: HardForkEnvelopeErr OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorExample OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data OneEraTipInfo (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern TipInfoShelley ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → ExampleTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoExample ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ExampleTipInfo c
name: OneEraTipInfo TipInfoShelley TipInfoExample

display_html: data family Query blk ∷ Type → Type
name: Query QueryIfCurrentShelley QueryIfCurrentExample QueryAnytimeShelley QueryAnytimeExample QueryHardFork

display_html:
data Either a b where
  • pattern QueryResultSuccess ∷ result → ExampleQueryResult c result
  • pattern QueryResultEraMismatch ∷ EraMismatch → ExampleQueryResult c result
name: Either QueryResultSuccess QueryResultEraMismatch

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerConfig (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ExampleLedgerConfig ∷ PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ExampleLedgerConfig c
name: HardForkLedgerConfig ExampleLedgerConfig

display_html:
data HardForkState (f ∷ Type → Type) (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ChainDepStateShelley ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c))) → ExampleChainDepState c
  • pattern ChainDepStateExample ∷ ChainDepState (BlockProtocol (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c))) → ExampleChainDepState c
name: HardForkState ChainDepStateShelley ChainDepStateExample

display_html:
data EraMismatch = EraMismatch {
  • ledgerEraName ∷ !Text
  • otherEraName ∷ !Text
}
name: EraMismatch EraMismatch ledgerEraName otherEraName

display_html: forecastAcrossShelley ∷ (EraCrypto eraFrom ~ EraCrypto eraTo, ShelleyBasedEra eraFrom) ⇒ ShelleyLedgerConfig eraFrom → ShelleyLedgerConfig eraTo → Bound → SlotNo → LedgerState (ShelleyBlock eraFrom) → Except OutsideForecastRange (Ticked (WrapLedgerView (ShelleyBlock eraTo)))
name: forecastAcrossShelley

display_html: overShelleyBasedLedgerState ∷ ∀ c. PraosCrypto c ⇒ (∀ era. (EraCrypto era ~ c, ShelleyBasedEra era) ⇒ LedgerState (ShelleyBlock era) → LedgerState (ShelleyBlock era)) → LedgerState (ExampleBlock c) → LedgerState (ExampleBlock c)
name: overShelleyBasedLedgerState

display_html: protocolInfoExample ∷ ∀ c m. (IOLike m, ExampleHardForkConstraints c) ⇒ ProtocolParamsShelleyBased (ShelleyEra c) → ProtocolParamsShelley → ProtocolParamsExample → ProtocolParamsTransition (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) (ShelleyBlock (ExampleEra c)) → ProtocolInfo m (ExampleBlock c)
name: protocolInfoExample
